Analytics Automated Version 2Â¶

Analytics Automated Version 2 (AAv2) is an enhanced framework built on the original Analytics Automated system. AAv2 now supports the Common Workflow Language (CWL), this upgrade introduces two key features:

  1. CWL File Upload: Users can upload CWL files to define and execute data analysis tasks.

  2. CWL File Download: Users can download data processing tasks in the system as CWL files.
